name: PROMISDepressionAssessment
title: PROMIS Depression Assessment
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set identifies assessments and assessment characteristics associated with the PROMIS Short Form Depression 8b.),(Data Element Scope: Data elements associated with this value set include assessments.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include values associated with the PROMIS Short Form Depression 8b, including the assessment or scores derived from the assessment.),(Exclusion Criteria: Individual items and responses from the PROMIS Short Form Depression 8b are excluded. Values associated with other versions of the PROMIS, including other versions of the Short Form Depression, are excluded. Values associated with other depression screenings are excluded.)
